H0.text: The left side of the heart pumps blood to all parts of the body, but the right side pumps blood to which organ in particular. Liver

H1.text: The left side of the heart pumps blood to all parts of the body, but the right side pumps blood to which organ in particular. Kidneys

H2.text: The left side of the heart pumps blood to all parts of the body, but the right side pumps blood to which organ in particular. Brain

H3.text: The left side of the heart pumps blood to all parts of the body, but the right side pumps blood to which organ in particular. Lung

A4.text: The pulmonary circulation carries deoxygenated blood from the heart to the lungs
